entry.key: FoundSomething6bI’m very sorry, b-but I have to look over my charts. I h-h-hope you don’t m-mind...
entry.value: I’m very sorry, b-but I have to look over my charts. I h-h-hope you don’t m-mind...

entry.key: ChertBreakdownNomaibB-b-but surely, I would have seen some kind of other sign than the supernovae, so p-perhaps...?
entry.value: B-b-but surely, I would have seen some kind of other sign than the supernovae, so p-perhaps...?

entry.key: FoundSomething7bNothing you’d like to discuss at the moment? That’s no trouble! If you do find something you wish to discuss, please, come find me! I’ll be here studying the stars for a while yet.
entry.value: Nothing you’d like to discuss at the moment? That’s no trouble! If you do find something you wish to discuss, please, come find me! I’ll be here studying the stars for a while yet.

entry.key: ChertIntroThe stars! They're all dying! There’ve been too many supernovae for it to be anything else!
entry.value: The stars! They're all dying! There’ve been too many supernovae for it to be anything else!

entry.key: ChertIntroWe’re next, do you understand?! Our sun! By Hearth’s name, we’re next!
entry.value: We’re next, do you understand?! Our sun! By Hearth’s name, we’re next!

entry.key: ChertSecondaryPlease, just... Leave me alone, won’t you?
entry.value: Please, just... Leave me alone, won’t you?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhat do you mean, "we’re next"?
entry.value: What do you mean, "we’re next"?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhy are the stars dying?
entry.value: Why are the stars dying?

entry.key: ChertNextIt’s the stars, you see. All the other stars are dying out. Oh, why did we have to be born at the end of the universe? And our sun, it...
entry.value: It’s the stars, you see. All the other stars are dying out. Oh, why did we have to be born at the end of the universe? And our sun, it...

entry.key: ChertNextThe star charts! Why? Why did I want to update them so badly? I didn’t have to know, but no, oh no, I had to update the star charts! I had to go looking for things I shouldn’t have! And now our sun is about to... about to... oh...
entry.value: The star charts! Why? Why did I want to update them so badly? I didn’t have to know, but no, oh no, I had to update the star charts! I had to go looking for things I shouldn’t have! And now our sun is about to... about to... oh...

entry.key: ChertNext...I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please.
entry.value: ...I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please.

entry.key: FoundSomethingWhy, isn’t that great! Do you know what, I’ve found a few things myself! Most of them have to do with the sun exploding!
entry.value: Why, isn’t that great! Do you know what, I’ve found a few things myself! Most of them have to do with the sun exploding!

entry.key: FoundSomethingOh, who cares?! What does it matter?! Nothing matters anymore! The sun is about to go supernova! And me, all my research, my life’s work, wasted!
entry.value: Oh, who cares?! What does it matter?! Nothing matters anymore! The sun is about to go supernova! And me, all my research, my life’s work, wasted!

entry.key: FoundSomething<size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>
entry.value: <size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>

entry.key: Chert1The star charts! It’s all the star charts’ fault! I didn’t have to know, but no, oh no, I had to update the star charts! I had to go looking for things I shouldn’t have! And now our sun is about to... about to... oh...
entry.value: The star charts! It’s all the star charts’ fault! I didn’t have to know, but no, oh no, I had to update the star charts! I had to go looking for things I shouldn’t have! And now our sun is about to... about to... oh...

entry.key: Chert1...I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please.
entry.value: ...I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please.

entry.key: Chert2Where should you go? Where can anyone go? Can’t you see it’s too late now?
entry.value: Where should you go? Where can anyone go? Can’t you see it’s too late now?

entry.key: Chert2Oh, who cares?! What does it matter?! Nothing matters anymore! The sun will probably blow up before you can even get there! And me, all my research, my life’s work, wasted!
entry.value: Oh, who cares?! What does it matter?! Nothing matters anymore! The sun will probably blow up before you can even get there! And me, all my research, my life’s work, wasted!

entry.key: Chert2<size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>
entry.value: <size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>

entry.key: Chert3Not as dangerous as what’s about to happen to our entire solar system!
entry.value: Not as dangerous as what’s about to happen to our entire solar system!

entry.key: Chert3I... I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please. I can’t believe this...
entry.value: I... I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please. I can’t believe this...

entry.key: Chert4I don't know — they're old! Far older than we realized and now all of them are dying!
entry.value: I don't know — they're old! Far older than we realized and now all of them are dying!

entry.key: Chert4What does it matter?! It doesn’t! It doesn’t matter at all! Nothing matters anymore! All my research, my life’s work, wasted!
entry.value: What does it matter?! It doesn’t! It doesn’t matter at all! Nothing matters anymore! All my research, my life’s work, wasted!

entry.key: Chert4<size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>
entry.value: <size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>

entry.key: Chert5I can’t believe this. I can’t believe this is happening. I can’t... I won’t! I won’t believe it!
entry.value: I can’t believe this. I can’t believe this is happening. I can’t... I won’t! I won’t believe it!

entry.key: ChertIntroOh, hello...
entry.value: Oh, hello...

entry.key: QuestionsCome, sit with me, my fellow traveler. Let’s sit together and watch the stars die.
entry.value: Come, sit with me, my fellow traveler. Let’s sit together and watch the stars die.

entry.key: ChertQuestionsSure, why not.
entry.value: Sure, why not.

entry.key: ChertQuestionsIf it helps, we’re in a time loop, so we won’t really die.
entry.value: If it helps, we’re in a time loop, so we won’t really die.

entry.key: ChertQuestionsNo, thanks.
entry.value: No, thanks.

entry.key: Chert1We only get so much time, don’t we? Ah, there was still more I wanted to do...
entry.value: We only get so much time, don’t we? Ah, there was still more I wanted to do...

entry.key: Chert1How unlucky to have been born at the end of the universe.
entry.value: How unlucky to have been born at the end of the universe.

entry.key: Chert2Ah, that’s a lovely thought. Is that how you’re coping with this?
entry.value: Ah, that’s a lovely thought. Is that how you’re coping with this?

entry.key: Chert2Does it help?
entry.value: Does it help?

entry.key: Chert3Perhaps you’re right. ...Yes, we should face this alone. That’s the way.
entry.value: Perhaps you’re right. ...Yes, we should face this alone. That’s the way.

entry.key: Chert3We enter this world alone, and we leave it alone...
entry.value: We enter this world alone, and we leave it alone...

entry.key: ChertSecondary1Any minute now...
entry.value: Any minute now...

entry.key: ChertSecondary2A time loop, you said? I like that idea...
entry.value: A time loop, you said? I like that idea...

entry.key: WaitingForOthersThe stars were beautiful, weren’t they? Even if our star is what ultimately killed us.
entry.value: The stars were beautiful, weren’t they? Even if our star is what ultimately killed us.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersI’ll wait here and remember them while you gather everybody.
entry.value: I’ll wait here and remember them while you gather everybody.

entry.value: Shall I begin?

entry.value: Yes.

entry.value: Not yet.

entry.value: Well, then, here I go!

entry.key: NotYetTake your time! I don’t think there’s anything left to go supernova.
entry.value: Take your time! I don’t think there’s anything left to go supernova.

entry.key: FarewellEven if it’s over now, I had a good time learning.
entry.value: Even if it’s over now, I had a good time learning.

entry.key: FarewellBut I think the rules are about to change.
entry.value: But I think the rules are about to change.

entry.key: SignNEW EXHIBITS COMING SOON!
entry.value: NEW EXHIBITS COMING SOON!

entry.key: Esker
entry.value: Esker

entry.value: Oh, hey, it’s you!

entry.value: Ground control didn’t tell me you were launching. Long time no see!

entry.value: Actually. I guess it’s been a long time since I’ve seen anyone.

entry.value: Don’t the other travelers come by?

entry.value: Was that you whistling?

entry.value: What is this place?

entry.value: Talk to you later.

entry.key: EskerEsker2Talk to you later.
entry.value: Talk to you later.

entry.key: OtherTravelersThe Lunar Outpost saw more traffic back when our ships were less sophisticated and needed more frequent repairs. Nowadays, it’s mostly used to keep a set of eyes on things.
entry.value: The Lunar Outpost saw more traffic back when our ships were less sophisticated and needed more frequent repairs. Nowadays, it’s mostly used to keep a set of eyes on things.

entry.key: OtherTravelersSometimes Chert comes by to say hi, but Gabbro is Gabbro, and you know how Riebeck feels about “unnecessary spaceflight.”
entry.value: Sometimes Chert comes by to say hi, but Gabbro is Gabbro, and you know how Riebeck feels about “unnecessary spaceflight.”

entry.key: LonelyA little. I’m in touch with ground control – Hornfels and Gossan, mostly – and they radio up to chat now and then.
entry.value: A little. I’m in touch with ground control – Hornfels and Gossan, mostly – and they radio up to chat now and then.

entry.key: LonelyAnd when ground control forgets I’m up here <size=20>and they usually do</size>, I launch my Little Scout at the village.
entry.value: And when ground control forgets I’m up here <size=20>and they usually do</size>, I launch my Little Scout at the village.

entry.key: EskerLonelyThey forget about you?
entry.value: They forget about you?

entry.key: EskerLonelyYou spy on us?
entry.value: You spy on us?

entry.key: ForgetI don’t blame them. For one, I don’t check in as often as the other travelers, since I’m always in one place.
entry.value: I don’t blame them. For one, I don’t check in as often as the other travelers, since I’m always in one place.

entry.key: ForgetAnd it’s not so bad up here, really. At least it’s peaceful and quiet. You don’t always get that in our solar system.
entry.value: And it’s not so bad up here, really. At least it’s peaceful and quiet. You don’t always get that in our solar system.

entry.key: ForgetLet alone in our village.
entry.value: Let alone in our village.

entry.key: SpyWhat? No! It’s not spying, it’s...
entry.value: What? No! It’s not spying, it’s...

entry.key: SpyIt’s one-way communication. That none of the villagers know about. <size=20>Because I’ve never told them</size>.
entry.value: It’s one-way communication. That none of the villagers know about. <size=20>Because I’ve never told them</size>.

entry.key: MusicProbably. Or actually, definitely. The other travelers carry instruments, so they don’t bother whistling.
entry.value: Probably. Or actually, definitely. The other travelers carry instruments, so they don’t bother whistling.

entry.key: MusicYou can pick up their music with a signalscope, you know. Best spot for that is the <color=orange>north pole</color>. Great reception.
entry.value: You can pick up their music with a signalscope, you know. Best spot for that is the <color=orange>north pole</color>. Great reception.

entry.key: MusicThe north pole is marked in red on your <color=orange>mini map</color>, but the Attlerock is a pretty small moon, really. Just go north. You can’t miss it.
entry.value: The north pole is marked in red on your <color=orange>mini map</color>, but the Attlerock is a pretty small moon, really. Just go north. You can’t miss it.

entry.key: PlaceHa ha, very funny. <Pause/>...Oh, stars above, you’re serious, aren’t you? That’s just depressing.
entry.value: Ha ha, very funny. <Pause/>...Oh, stars above, you’re serious, aren’t you? That’s just depressing.

entry.key: Place<color=grey>Sigh...</color><Pause/>Welcome to the Lunar Outpost, which apparently the space program doesn’t bother to teach anyone anymore.
entry.value: <color=grey>Sigh...</color><Pause/>Welcome to the Lunar Outpost, which apparently the space program doesn’t bother to teach anyone anymore.

entry.key: PlaceWhen we first started Outer Wilds, travelers used to bring their ships here all the time for repairs. Our spacefaring technology has improved loads since then, but the older ships tended to, uh, fall apart a lot. Like, more than they do now.
entry.value: When we first started Outer Wilds, travelers used to bring their ships here all the time for repairs. Our spacefaring technology has improved loads since then, but the older ships tended to, uh, fall apart a lot. Like, more than they do now.

entry.key: PlaceUsing the outpost cut down on the number of launches and landings taking place in the village and also the number of fires. Nowadays, though, it’s mostly just me up here raising saplings from Timber Hearth and keeping an eye on things.
entry.value: Using the outpost cut down on the number of launches and landings taking place in the village and also the number of fires. Nowadays, though, it’s mostly just me up here raising saplings from Timber Hearth and keeping an eye on things.

entry.key: MarlHeh, Marl is probably the only one who remembers I’m up here. I should go see the big lug soon.
entry.value: Heh, Marl is probably the only one who remembers I’m up here. I should go see the big lug soon.

entry.key: MarlDon’t tell them about this, but sometimes I throw my Little Scout down to make sure Marl isn’t doing anything stupid. I worry that big tree in the village wouldn’t stand a chance otherwise.
entry.value: Don’t tell them about this, but sometimes I throw my Little Scout down to make sure Marl isn’t doing anything stupid. I worry that big tree in the village wouldn’t stand a chance otherwise.

entry.key: SecondaryHi again. Can’t get enough of the moon? ...I’m kidding.
entry.value: Hi again. Can’t get enough of the moon? ...I’m kidding.

entry.key: FirstConversationDo you hear music?
entry.value: Do you hear music?

entry.key: WaitingForOthersAren’t you forgetting someone?
entry.value: Aren’t you forgetting someone?

entry.key: ReadyToPlayI can’t wait to play with the whole group again. Can I start?
entry.value: I can’t wait to play with the whole group again. Can I start?

entry.value: Yes.

entry.value: Not yet.

entry.key: StartPlayingOk, I won’t let you down!
entry.value: Ok, I won’t let you down!

entry.value: Oh, ok. I’ll– I’ll get to play soon though, right?

entry.key: FarewellWow... How long has it been since I got to make music with everyone around a campfire?
entry.value: Wow... How long has it been since I got to make music with everyone around a campfire?

entry.key: FarewellI’m really happy we’re all here.
entry.value: I’m really happy we’re all here.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersHatchling! You found me!
entry.value: Hatchling! You found me!

entry.key: WaitingForOthersNice to have company around a campfire, isn’t it? Go on, go get the others. Wouldn’t want ’em to miss out!
entry.value: Nice to have company around a campfire, isn’t it? Go on, go get the others. Wouldn’t want ’em to miss out!

entry.key: ReadyToPlayWhaddya say, then — should I get out the ol’ harmonica?
entry.value: Whaddya say, then — should I get out the ol’ harmonica?

entry.value: Yes.

entry.key: FeldsparReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Not yet.

entry.key: StartPlayingHa ha! Here goes nothing!
entry.value: Ha ha! Here goes nothing!

entry.key: NotYetYou got it hatchling. When you’re ready, just say the word.
entry.value: You got it hatchling. When you’re ready, just say the word.

entry.key: FarewellYou cut it a little close, don’t you think?
entry.value: You cut it a little close, don’t you think?

entry.key: FarewellWell, it worked out all right in the end, I suppose.
entry.value: Well, it worked out all right in the end, I suppose.

entry.key: FarewellAhh, I hope there are beasties in the next one.
entry.value: Ahh, I hope there are beasties in the next one.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalTrip 4(?), entry #... I’m gonna say “not 1.” \\n Crashes: 3 \\n Boring crashes: 0 (a personal best!)
entry.value: Trip 4(?), entry #... I’m gonna say “not 1.” \\n Crashes: 3 \\n Boring crashes: 0 (a personal best!)

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalWhoa ho! Never thought I’d see one of these beasties outside of Giant’s Deep! They were awfully useful back there — maybe a jellyfish could be useful here, too?
entry.value: Whoa ho! Never thought I’d see one of these beasties outside of Giant’s Deep! They were awfully useful back there — maybe a jellyfish could be useful here, too?

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalBLEARGH. This thing tastes terrible! The outside is all rubbery and tough -- maybe that’s because it insulates the jellyfish’s insides from getting zapped by electricity?
entry.value: BLEARGH. This thing tastes terrible! The outside is all rubbery and tough -- maybe that’s because it insulates the jellyfish’s insides from getting zapped by electricity?

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalRight, I’m going inside of this jellyfish’s interior cavity to see if what’s in there tastes any better.
entry.value: Right, I’m going inside of this jellyfish’s interior cavity to see if what’s in there tastes any better.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalNote to Feldspar: DO NOT EAT THIS EVEN IF YOU ARE DYING. It would be too sad if this were the last thing you ever ate in this life.
entry.value: Note to Feldspar: DO NOT EAT THIS EVEN IF YOU ARE DYING. It would be too sad if this were the last thing you ever ate in this life.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalI guess these jellyfish are only useful for insulation from electricity. Again, DO NOT EAT. (Love, Feldspar)
entry.value: I guess these jellyfish are only useful for insulation from electricity. Again, DO NOT EAT. (Love, Feldspar)

entry.key: MeetGabbroNice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?
entry.value: Nice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?

entry.key: MeetGabbroSo hey, don’t laugh, but I think I might have had some kind of spiritual experience with a rock shaped like a face.
entry.value: So hey, don’t laugh, but I think I might have had some kind of spiritual experience with a rock shaped like a face.

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro...What?
entry.value: ...What?

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbroMe too!
entry.value: Me too!

entry.key: Explanation1One of the islands on Giant’s Deep has a Nomai statue on the beach - ever seen one? I brought one back to Timber Hearth with me. Big stone sculpture of a Nomai’s head, three eyes and everything. Beautifully carved, too.
entry.value: One of the islands on Giant’s Deep has a Nomai statue on the beach - ever seen one? I brought one back to Timber Hearth with me. Big stone sculpture of a Nomai’s head, three eyes and everything. Beautifully carved, too.

entry.key: Explanation1So one minute I’m standing on an island looking at a Nomai sculpture on the beach, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.
entry.value: So one minute I’m standing on an island looking at a Nomai sculpture on the beach, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.

entry.key: Explanation1The sculpture replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.
entry.value: The sculpture replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.

entry.key: GabbroExplanation1That happened to me at the observatory.
entry.value: That happened to me at the observatory.

entry.key: YouTooHuhYou too, huh?
entry.value: You too, huh?

entry.key: Explanation2You’re saying the statue I brought to the museum started glowing at you? Yeah, sounds about right.
entry.value: You’re saying the statue I brought to the museum started glowing at you? Yeah, sounds about right.

entry.key: Explanation2One minute I’m standing on an island looking at a Nomai sculpture on the beach, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.
entry.value: One minute I’m standing on an island looking at a Nomai sculpture on the beach, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.

entry.key: Explanation2It replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.
entry.value: It replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.

entry.key: ExplanationMergeIt didn’t seem bad, just... weird? Were we the only ones who saw that happen?
entry.value: It didn’t seem bad, just... weird? Were we the only ones who saw that happen?

entry.key: ExplanationMergeI tried radioing Hornfels and asking them about it, but they told me I must have just nodded off out here and gotten confused.
entry.value: I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them about it, but they told me I must have just nodded off out here and gotten confused.

entry.key: ExplanationMergeThen we talked about dreams until Hornfels told me to go refill my oxygen tank before I talked myself to death.
entry.value: Then we talked about dreams until Hornfels told me to go refill my oxygen tank before I talked myself to death.

entry.key: ExplanationMergeSo that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! Let’s talk about you, you know?
entry.value: So that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! Let’s talk about you, you know?

entry.key: Gabbro1_saidhiHave you ever stared at a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll pull you into a trance if you look at ’em long enough.
entry.value: Have you ever stared at a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll pull you into a trance if you look at ’em long enough.

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuI found a photo of you inside the old radio tower.
entry.value: I found a photo of you inside the old radio tower.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoingWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Well, what are any of us doing here, really?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: ...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoingBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
entry.value: But I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoingI mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.
entry.value: I mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.

entry.key: WhereToExploreHere’s something you might like — I saw a bright flash in the sky not too long ago. Something must have happened up there in orbit around the planet.
entry.value: Here’s something you might like — I saw a bright flash in the sky not too long ago. Something must have happened up there in orbit around the planet.

entry.key: WhereToExploreWhat else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?
entry.value: What else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?

entry.key: WhereToExploreI was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.
entry.value: I was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.

entry.key: WhereToExploreIf you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.
entry.value: If you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.

entry.key: ThisPlanetHaha, I know, right?
entry.value: Haha, I know, right?

entry.key: ThisPlanet...Oh, you meant, like, tell you more about it? I gotcha. Well, Giant’s Deep is massive, and mostly water. No surprises there.
entry.value: ...Oh, you meant, like, tell you more about it? I gotcha. Well, Giant’s Deep is massive, and mostly water. No surprises there.

entry.key: ThisPlanetThere’s a strong current a ways beneath the surface that prevents anything from sinking below it. Seriously, I tried everything I could think of to get past that current, and neither idea worked.
entry.value: There’s a strong current a ways beneath the surface that prevents anything from sinking below it. Seriously, I tried everything I could think of to get past that current, and neither idea worked.

entry.key: ThisPlanetAs for land masses, I’ve counted four islands, including this one. There’s also the one with that Nomai statue I saw on the beach.
entry.value: As for land masses, I’ve counted four islands, including this one. There’s also the one with that Nomai statue I saw on the beach.

entry.key: ThisPlanetYou’ve seen the cyclones? Yeah, they’re hard to miss. They’ll toss up everything in their path, islands included. Little tip — if you get picked up, try to land in water. Less likely to kill you.
entry.value: You’ve seen the cyclones? Yeah, they’re hard to miss. They’ll toss up everything in their path, islands included. Little tip — if you get picked up, try to land in water. Less likely to kill you.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_1Nice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?
entry.value: Nice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_1So hey, don’t laugh, but I think I might have just, like, died? Somehow?
entry.value: So hey, don’t laugh, but I think I might have just, like, died? Somehow?

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_1Do you remember, y’know, dying a few minutes ago? Maybe?
entry.value: Do you remember, y’know, dying a few minutes ago? Maybe?

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro2F_1Oh yeah, we definitely died.
entry.value: Oh yeah, we definitely died.

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro2F_1I think we’re the only ones who know.
entry.value: I think we’re the only ones who know.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_2Okay, cool, that’s what I thought. It was all way too vivid to be a dream.
entry.value: Okay, cool, that’s what I thought. It was all way too vivid to be a dream.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_2I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them if they had died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical.
entry.value: I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them if they had died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_3Yeah, I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them if they had died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical or something.
entry.value: Yeah, I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them if they had died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical or something.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_4Well, if you remember dying, then I guess I didn’t just fall asleep and have a bad dream or something. I dunno what’s going on, though. Today’s been weird.
entry.value: Well, if you remember dying, then I guess I didn’t just fall asleep and have a bad dream or something. I dunno what’s going on, though. Today’s been weird.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_4Like, I was on a different island earlier, right? I was on the beach looking at one of those big stone statues of a Nomai head, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.
entry.value: Like, I was on a different island earlier, right? I was on the beach looking at one of those big stone statues of a Nomai head, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_4The statue replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.
entry.value: The statue replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro2F_4That happened to me at the observatory.
entry.value: That happened to me at the observatory.

entry.key: YouTooHuhCome to think of it, when I died, I saw what I’m pretty sure were my memories going backward, just like that time with the statue. Do you think the Nomai statues are related to us dying somehow?
entry.value: Come to think of it, when I died, I saw what I’m pretty sure were my memories going backward, just like that time with the statue. Do you think the Nomai statues are related to us dying somehow?

entry.key: YouTooHuhAnd another thing - we died, but we aren’t dead? That’s pretty unusual for Hearthians.
entry.value: And another thing - we died, but we aren’t dead? That’s pretty unusual for Hearthians.

entry.key: YouTooHuhWell, that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! Let’s talk about you, you know?
entry.value: Well, that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! Let’s talk about you, you know?

entry.key: Gabbro2F_saidhiHave you ever stared at a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll put you in a trance if you look at ’em long enough.
entry.value: Have you ever stared at a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll put you in a trance if you look at ’em long enough.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2FWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Well, what are any of us doing here, really?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2F...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: ...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2FBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
entry.value: But I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2FI mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.
entry.value: I mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_2FWell actually, after waking up from, you know, dying, I saw the same bright flash in the sky. Something must be happening up there in orbit around the planet.
entry.value: Well actually, after waking up from, you know, dying, I saw the same bright flash in the sky. Something must be happening up there in orbit around the planet.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_2FWhat else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?
entry.value: What else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?

entry.key: WhereToExplore_2FI was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.
entry.value: I was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_2FIf you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.
entry.value: If you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.

entry.key: Hornfels
entry.value: Hornfels

entry.key: Curator1There you are! I just finished pre-flight observations, and local conditions are good. Time to get our newest astronaut off the ground!
entry.value: There you are! I just finished pre-flight observations, and local conditions are good. Time to get our newest astronaut off the ground!

entry.key: Curator1And you’ll be our first astronaut ever equipped with a Nomai translator tool! I confess, I’ve been giddy all day just thinking about it.
entry.value: And you’ll be our first astronaut ever equipped with a Nomai translator tool! I confess, I’ve been giddy all day just thinking about it.

entry.key: Curator1We’re better equipped than ever to unravel the mysteries of the Nomai. You and Hal should be very proud of your work!
entry.value: We’re better equipped than ever to unravel the mysteries of the Nomai. You and Hal should be very proud of your work!

entry.key: Curator1Tell me, what’s your plan once you’re in space?
entry.value: Tell me, what’s your plan once you’re in space?

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I’m going to learn more about the Nomai.
entry.value: I’m going to learn more about the Nomai.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I’ll meet up with the other travelers.
entry.value: I’ll meet up with the other travelers.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I want to go somewhere no one’s gone before.
entry.value: I want to go somewhere no one’s gone before.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I think I’ll start with something small.
entry.value: I think I’ll start with something small.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I don’t know.
entry.value: I don’t know.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I’m gonna wing it!
entry.value: I’m gonna wing it!

entry.key: Curator2I might have guessed as much! No sense in making a translator tool if you’re not going to use it to translate anything.
entry.value: I might have guessed as much! No sense in making a translator tool if you’re not going to use it to translate anything.

entry.key: Curator2We’ve barely scratched the surface of the Nomai writing in our solar system, so we still know very little about them. We’ve no idea if they originated here or traveled here, or why they disappeared.
entry.value: We’ve barely scratched the surface of the Nomai writing in our solar system, so we still know very little about them. We’ve no idea if they originated here or traveled here, or why they disappeared.

entry.key: Curator2That tool of yours should prove indispensible in solving the mystery of this ancient species!
entry.value: That tool of yours should prove indispensible in solving the mystery of this ancient species!

entry.key: Curator3You’re going to check in with them, are you? Not a bad plan - no one knows the solar system better than our astronauts.
entry.value: You’re going to check in with them, are you? Not a bad plan - no one knows the solar system better than our astronauts.

entry.key: Curator3Let’s see... Chert is on the Hourglass Twins, Riebeck is on Brittle Hollow, and Gabbro is on Giant’s Deep, last I checked.
entry.value: Let’s see... Chert is on the Hourglass Twins, Riebeck is on Brittle Hollow, and Gabbro is on Giant’s Deep, last I checked.

entry.key: Curator3And... Well, there’s Feldspar, obviously, but of course we don’t know where they are, or if they’re even alive.
entry.value: And... Well, there’s Feldspar, obviously, but of course we don’t know where they are, or if they’re even alive.

entry.key: Curator3Feldspar has been lost for a very long time, I’m afraid.
entry.value: Feldspar has been lost for a very long time, I’m afraid.

entry.key: Curator3...On a more cheerful note, you’ll find Esker stationed on the Attlerock. They’re not a traveler so much as a lunar local, but I’m sure they’d appreciate a visit nevertheless.
entry.value: ...On a more cheerful note, you’ll find Esker stationed on the Attlerock. They’re not a traveler so much as a lunar local, but I’m sure they’d appreciate a visit nevertheless.

entry.key: Curator4I like it! You’ll have plenty of options to choose from.
entry.value: I like it! You’ll have plenty of options to choose from.

entry.key: Curator4No one’s ever landed on the Interloper before, you know. Perhaps you’ll be the first?
entry.value: No one’s ever landed on the Interloper before, you know. Perhaps you’ll be the first?

entry.key: Curator4I must say... Should you choose to go to Dark Bramble, be very careful. No one’s explored there before, either, for what you’ll find are excellent reasons.
entry.value: I must say... Should you choose to go to Dark Bramble, be very careful. No one’s explored there before, either, for what you’ll find are excellent reasons.

entry.key: Curator5You’d prefer to ease into things? That’s a sensible plan! More sensible than most of our astronauts tend to be, and that’s a fact.
entry.value: You’d prefer to ease into things? That’s a sensible plan! More sensible than most of our astronauts tend to be, and that’s a fact.

entry.key: Curator5Do you think you’ll go to the Attlerock, then? Our moon would be a safe place to travel to and get your bearings in space, and I’m sure Esker would appreciate the visit.
entry.value: Do you think you’ll go to the Attlerock, then? Our moon would be a safe place to travel to and get your bearings in space, and I’m sure Esker would appreciate the visit.

entry.key: Curator5Plus, we don’t know what the ancient Nomai ruins on the moon are, or why they were built. You could put your new translator tool through its paces!
entry.value: Plus, we don’t know what the ancient Nomai ruins on the moon are, or why they were built. You could put your new translator tool through its paces!

entry.key: Curator6Haha! Overwhelmed by the options, perhaps? I don’t blame you.
entry.value: Haha! Overwhelmed by the options, perhaps? I don’t blame you.

entry.key: Curator6If you need help getting started, you could go visit Esker on the moon. They’re alone on the Attlerock most of the time, so I’m sure they’d appreciate it.
entry.value: If you need help getting started, you could go visit Esker on the moon. They’re alone on the Attlerock most of the time, so I’m sure they’d appreciate it.

entry.key: Curator6Plus, we don’t know what the ancient Nomai ruins on the moon are, or why they were built. You could put your new translator tool through its paces!
entry.value: Plus, we don’t know what the ancient Nomai ruins on the moon are, or why they were built. You could put your new translator tool through its paces!

entry.key: Curator7Planning to follow in the footsteps of Feldspar and the great Outer Wilds Ventures tradition, are you? I might have guessed.
entry.value: Planning to follow in the footsteps of Feldspar and the great Outer Wilds Ventures tradition, are you? I might have guessed.

entry.key: Curator7Well, see if you can’t put that translator tool of yours to good use while you’re out there!
entry.value: Well, see if you can’t put that translator tool of yours to good use while you’re out there!

entry.key: Curator8Well then, looks like all that’s left is to send you off! All in all, it’s a fine day for a launch!
entry.value: Well then, looks like all that’s left is to send you off! All in all, it’s a fine day for a launch!

entry.key: HornfelsCurator8I’m ready to get off this rock!
entry.value: I’m ready to get off this rock!

entry.key: HornfelsCurator8I’m ready to die in space.
entry.value: I’m ready to die in space.

entry.key: Curator9Excellent! You’ll be needing the <color=orange>launch codes</color>, then.
entry.value: Excellent! You’ll be needing the <color=orange>launch codes</color>, then.

entry.key: Curator9Here they are. Best get off the ground before Slate makes any more modifications to your ship, eh?
entry.value: Here they are. Best get off the ground before Slate makes any more modifications to your ship, eh?

entry.key: Curator9Good luck out there! Let me know if I can help you with anything.
entry.value: Good luck out there! Let me know if I can help you with anything.

entry.key: Curator10I’m not one for superstition, but isn’t that kind of unlucky to say before a launch?
entry.value: I’m not one for superstition, but isn’t that kind of unlucky to say before a launch?

entry.key: Curator10At any rate, here are the <color=orange>launch codes</color>. Try not to worry too much - our ships are every bit as safe as Slate could be persuaded to make them.
entry.value: At any rate, here are the <color=orange>launch codes</color>. Try not to worry too much - our ships are every bit as safe as Slate could be persuaded to make them.

entry.key: Curator10Best of luck out there! Let me know if I can help you with anything.
entry.value: Best of luck out there! Let me know if I can help you with anything.

entry.value: Hello again!

entry.value: Back so soon?

entry.value: Was there something you needed?

entry.value: I found Feldspar!

entry.value: The Nomai statue opened its eyes!

entry.key: CuratorOtherTravelersFeldspar has been lost for a very long time, I’m afraid.
entry.value: Feldspar has been lost for a very long time, I’m afraid.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparFeldspar was one of the four founding members of Outer Wilds, along with our flight coach Gossan, Slate the engineer, and me.
entry.value: Feldspar was one of the four founding members of Outer Wilds, along with our flight coach Gossan, Slate the engineer, and me.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparAs ground control and later the museum curator, I didn’t work with Feldspar as closely as Slate and Gossan did. I can tell you Feldspar was absolutely fearless, though. Nothing scared them.
entry.value: As ground control and later the museum curator, I didn’t work with Feldspar as closely as Slate and Gossan did. I can tell you Feldspar was absolutely fearless, though. Nothing scared them.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparTest-piloted everything Slate ever built! It’s a wonder Feldspar lived to see space, frankly, but they did. Flew all sorts of dangerous stunts and explored everything they could find.
entry.value: Test-piloted everything Slate ever built! It’s a wonder Feldspar lived to see space, frankly, but they did. Flew all sorts of dangerous stunts and explored everything they could find.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparAnd then one day, they just... didn’t come back. We don’t know what happened, or where Feldspar went, or even whether they’re still alive.
entry.value: And then one day, they just... didn’t come back. We don’t know what happened, or where Feldspar went, or even whether they’re still alive.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparIt’s been a long time since they left.
entry.value: It’s been a long time since they left.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenWhat? You say the statue opened its eyes and looked at you?!
entry.value: What? You say the statue opened its eyes and looked at you?!

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpen...How wonderful for you.
entry.value: ...How wonderful for you.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenNo, truly, that’s wonderful! It really is. ...Even if I have been pouring over it every night for weeks. It’s stupendous you were able to get a reaction from the statue just by glancing at it a few times.
entry.value: No, truly, that’s wonderful! It really is. ...Even if I have been pouring over it every night for weeks. It’s stupendous you were able to get a reaction from the statue just by glancing at it a few times.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenErgh, sorry, that’s not a very scientific thing to say, is it? I am glad. I’m just also insufferably, profoundly jealous. You’ll have to forgive me.
entry.value: Ergh, sorry, that’s not a very scientific thing to say, is it? I am glad. I’m just also insufferably, profoundly jealous. You’ll have to forgive me.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenThat aside - I have research to do! I wonder why the statue opened its eyes. Surely this means they aren’t mere decorative ornaments...?
entry.value: That aside - I have research to do! I wonder why the statue opened its eyes. Surely this means they aren’t mere decorative ornaments...?

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundYou found Feldspar?! And they’re in Dark Bramble?! Stars above, this is wonderful news! Thank you! Thank you for finding them!
entry.value: You found Feldspar?! And they’re in Dark Bramble?! Stars above, this is wonderful news! Thank you! Thank you for finding them!

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundThat Feldspar didn’t immediately join you on your ship and return here is incredibly Feldspar of them. We were never entirely sure what Feldspar was thinking back then, either.
entry.value: That Feldspar didn’t immediately join you on your ship and return here is incredibly Feldspar of them. We were never entirely sure what Feldspar was thinking back then, either.

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundStill, we ought to fish them out of that dreadful place with all haste! I’ll radio Gossan and have them prepare a ship. It really should be Gossan who brings Feldspar home.
entry.value: Still, we ought to fish them out of that dreadful place with all haste! I’ll radio Gossan and have them prepare a ship. It really should be Gossan who brings Feldspar home.

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundAgain, thank you. You can hardly imagine how profoundly happy I am to hear they’re alive and unharmed.
entry.value: Again, thank you. You can hardly imagine how profoundly happy I am to hear they’re alive and unharmed.

entry.key: Curator14Take care!
entry.value: Take care!

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenLoop2Hey, look at this - the statue opened its eyes! Bet you wish you’d seen that happen, huh?<Pause/><color=grey> Sigh...</color> Me, too.
entry.value: Hey, look at this - the statue opened its eyes! Bet you wish you’d seen that happen, huh?<Pause/><color=grey> Sigh...</color> Me, too.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenLoop2I’m not even a little closer to understanding what’s going on with this statue.
entry.value: I’m not even a little closer to understanding what’s going on with this statue.

entry.key: SignHornfel’s Observations
entry.value: Hornfel’s Observations

entry.key: SignThis is incredible! At first I thought the points of light in this image were stars, but they’re not... they’re galaxies!
entry.value: This is incredible! At first I thought the points of light in this image were stars, but they’re not... they’re galaxies!

entry.key: SignAnd this image covers just a tiny patch of the whole sky, which means the universe contains at least a thousand times more galaxies than we previously imagined.
entry.value: And this image covers just a tiny patch of the whole sky, which means the universe contains at least a thousand times more galaxies than we previously imagined.

entry.key: SignI... I think I need to sit down.
entry.value: I... I think I need to sit down.

entry.key: SignHmmm, this is odd. According to my redshift calculations, every single galaxy in this image is moving away from us.
entry.value: Hmmm, this is odd. According to my redshift calculations, every single galaxy in this image is moving away from us.

entry.key: SignIn fact, the farther away a galaxy is, the faster it appears to be moving away.
entry.value: In fact, the farther away a galaxy is, the faster it appears to be moving away.

entry.key: SignIt’s almost as if the entire universe is expanding.
entry.value: It’s almost as if the entire universe is expanding.

entry.key: SignBut if that’s true, was everything closer together in the past? And how far back can we extrapolate? Did the universe have a beginning?
entry.value: But if that’s true, was everything closer together in the past? And how far back can we extrapolate? Did the universe have a beginning?

entry.key: Moraine
entry.value: Moraine

entry.key: SignalscopeKid1Hm? Oh, hello, astronaut.
entry.value: Hm? Oh, hello, astronaut.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid1This is good weather for your launch, right? That’s lucky!
entry.value: This is good weather for your launch, right? That’s lucky!

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid1What are you up to?
entry.value: What are you up to?

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid1Any good sounds from space today?
entry.value: Any good sounds from space today?

entry.key: SignalscopeKid5Hello, again.
entry.value: Hello, again.

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid5Haven’t you been up in this tree a while?
entry.value: Haven’t you been up in this tree a while?

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid5Any good sounds from space today?
entry.value: Any good sounds from space today?

entry.key: SignalscopeKid2I’m using my signalscope to pick up sounds from distant planets.
entry.value: I’m using my signalscope to pick up sounds from distant planets.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid2It’s set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency so I can pick up the travelers’ music.
entry.value: It’s set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency so I can pick up the travelers’ music.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid3There are! My signalscope is set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency, so I’m listening to the travelers’ music.
entry.value: There are! My signalscope is set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency, so I’m listening to the travelers’ music.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid4Last night I heard Riebeck’s banjo coming from Brittle Hollow. I hope that means they’re safe.
entry.value: Last night I heard Riebeck’s banjo coming from Brittle Hollow. I hope that means they’re safe.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid4I can hear different planets, too! It depends on what time of day or night it is, since different planets are in the sky at different times.
entry.value: I can hear different planets, too! It depends on what time of day or night it is, since different planets are in the sky at different times.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid4Signalscopes are cool.
entry.value: Signalscopes are cool.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid6I’m concerned Marl will cut down this tree if there’s no one in it, so I don’t want to leave it for too long.
entry.value: I’m concerned Marl will cut down this tree if there’s no one in it, so I don’t want to leave it for too long.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid6Mayor Rutile says Marl isn’t supposed to cut it down, but I don’t think they see eyes-to-eyes on this one.
entry.value: Mayor Rutile says Marl isn’t supposed to cut it down, but I don’t think they see eyes-to-eyes on this one.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid6Um, I’ll still watch your launch, though! I’ll have a good view from up here.
entry.value: Um, I’ll still watch your launch, though! I’ll have a good view from up here.

entry.value: Retrieving stored coordinates from <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.

entry.value: Displaying coordinates for the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersIt’s, um, it’s not quite time yet.
entry.value: It’s, um, it’s not quite time yet.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersI’m pretty sure we’ll need the others for this next part. We’ll need, you know... everyone.
entry.value: I’m pretty sure we’ll need the others for this next part. We’ll need, you know... everyone.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersNo rush! Take your time. <size=20>It might not even exist here...</size>
entry.value: No rush! Take your time. <size=20>It might not even exist here...</size>

entry.key: ReadyToPlayShould I begin?
entry.value: Should I begin?

entry.key: RiebeckReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Yes.

entry.key: RiebeckReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Not yet.

entry.key: StartPlayingYou g-got it. I’ll do my best!
entry.value: You g-got it. I’ll do my best!

entry.key: NotYetOk, I'll wait until you're ready.
entry.value: Ok, I'll wait until you're ready.

entry.key: FarewellI learned a lot, by the end of everything.
entry.value: I learned a lot, by the end of everything.

entry.key: FarewellThe past is past, now, but that’s... you know, that’s okay! It’s never really gone completely. The future is always built on the past, even if we won't get to see it.
entry.value: The past is past, now, but that’s... you know, that’s okay! It’s never really gone completely. The future is always built on the past, even if we won't get to see it.

entry.key: FarewellStill, it’s, um, time for something new, now.
entry.value: Still, it’s, um, time for something new, now.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersHypothesis: Everyone must be here before we can begin.
entry.value: Hypothesis: Everyone must be here before we can begin.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersOnce they arrive, I believe we’ll be ready for the next step.
entry.value: Once they arrive, I believe we’ll be ready for the next step.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersI’m glad you remembered me.
entry.value: I’m glad you remembered me.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayA conscious observer has entered the Eye. I wonder what happens now.
entry.value: A conscious observer has entered the Eye. I wonder what happens now.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayIs it time to find out?
entry.value: Is it time to find out?

entry.key: SolanumReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Yes.

entry.key: SolanumReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Not yet.

entry.key: StartPlayingThis song is new to me, but I am honored to be a part of it.
entry.value: This song is new to me, but I am honored to be a part of it.

entry.key: NotYetThen I will wait until you are ready to know the answer.
entry.value: Then I will wait until you are ready to know the answer.

entry.key: FarewellI believe we’ve reached the end of our journey.
entry.value: I believe we’ve reached the end of our journey.

entry.key: FarewellAll that remains is to collapse the innumerable possibilites before us.
entry.value: All that remains is to collapse the innumerable possibilites before us.

entry.key: FarewellAre you ready to learn what comes next?
entry.value: Are you ready to learn what comes next?

entry.key: SolanumFarewellYes.
entry.value: Yes.

entry.key: SolanumFarewellNot yet.
entry.value: Not yet.

entry.key: Farewell2I admire your curiosity, friend. Let’s find out together.
entry.value: I admire your curiosity, friend. Let’s find out together.

entry.key: Farewell3It’s tempting to linger in this moment, while every possibility still exists.
entry.value: It’s tempting to linger in this moment, while every possibility still exists.

entry.key: Farewell3But unless they are collapsed by an observer, they will never be more than possibilities.
entry.value: But unless they are collapsed by an observer, they will never be more than possibilities.

entry.key: SignI saw smoke coming from Youngbark Crater up north and figured I should go check it out. You can use the scout launcher, just please don’t break it while I’m gone – Tektite
entry.value: I saw smoke coming from Youngbark Crater up north and figured I should go check it out. You can use the scout launcher, just please don’t break it while I’m gone.\\n\\n– Tektite

TranslationTableEntry.key: VillageThe Nomai statue in the observatory opened its eyes and looked at me! I saw strange glowing lights and my own memories flashed before my eyes.

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe negative time interval measured at the White Hole Station was further investigated at the High Energy Lab (in the canyon at Ember Twin’s equator).

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Ash Twin Project was planned at the High Energy Lab, a building with large solar panels on Ember Twin’s equator.

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Nomai successfully reproduced the temporal anomaly first observed at the White Hole Station (warped objects appear to arrive before they depart).
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dx nOmI sxksesfulE rEprxdUst Dx tempRlx` nx`mo`lx`qE fRst bx`zRvd ta` Dx wIt hOl staSxn (w*pt bo`jekts px`qJ tU rx`vI` bif* DA dip@t).

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Nomai discovered they could increase the negative time interval between arrival and departure by adding energy to the warp cores.

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Nomai wanted to know if a 22-minute negative time interval was possible. They concluded it would require new technology to produce the necessary energy as well an advanced warp core to handle those energies. Ash Twin was proposed as a location for the project.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai survivors who crashed on Ember Twin decided to seek shelter in the caves beneath their crashed escape pod.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityI found a trailmarker for the the Sunless City, but the path is blocked.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityA Nomai city built into the walls of a huge underground cavern. The city is divided vertically into four districts.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai debated building a Sun Station in order to power the Ash Twin Project. Several Nomai opposed its construction, arguing that failure could result in the destruction of the solar system.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai traveled to this solar system in pursuit of a signal from something older than the universe itself. They named the source of this signal the "Eye of the universe."
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dx nOmI travxld tU Dis sOlR sistxm ni` pRsUt vx` qx signxl frxm sxmTiN lO`dR Dan Dx yUnivRs ti`self. DA nAmd Dx s*s vx` Dis signxl DE "qI vx` Dx yUnivRs."

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilI found a cave with an anglerfish fossil inside, but the opening is only big enough for my scout.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Fossil Fish Cave
TranslationTableEntry.value: fosl fiS kAv

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilNomai children used to play a game in Fossil Fish Cave. There is a way to enter Fossil Fish Cave from Stepping Stone Cave.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe entrance from Stepping Stone Cave is hard to see unless the anglerfish is fed a light first.
TranslationTableEntry.value: DE ne`trxns frxm stepiN stOn kAv zi` h@d tU sE nx`les DE NA`glRfiS zi` fed qx lIt fRst.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilNomai children used to play a game here. One player was the anglerfish and wore a blindfold. The rest of the children (the littlefish) lined up against one wall. When the anglerfish said go, the littlefish had to sneak across to the other side.
TranslationTableEntry.value: nOmI cildrxn yUst tU plA qx gAm hJ. wxn plAqR wxz DE NA`glRfiS na`d w* qx blIndfOld. Dx rest vx` Dx cildrxn (Dx litlfiS) lInd px` gx`ne`st wxn wol. wen DE NA`glRfiS sed gO, Dx litlfiS had tU snEk kx`ros tU DE Dx`qR sId.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe blindfold rule was added because real anglerfish are blind.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dx blIndfOld rUl wxz da`di` bEkxz rEl NA`glRfiS q@ blInd.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe adult Nomai were delighted to see the children incorporate their research into the game's rules.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum CavesThe Nomai detected a quantum signal coming from somewhere on the Hourglass Twins.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum CavesThe Nomai noticed a strange wandering rock that appeared in multiple caves on Ember Twin’s northern hemisphere.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dx nOmI nOtist qx strAnj wondRNi` rok Dat px`dJ` ni` mltipl kAvz no` me`bR twinz n*DRn hemisfJ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum CavesI found a strange rock shard that moves when I’m not watching. It emits a signal on the Quantum Fluctuations frequency.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed Cave
TranslationTableEntry.value: lAkbed kAv

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveThe wandering rock was first spotted in a cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at Ember Twin’s north pole.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveA Nomai named Coleus mysteriously vanished from a cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at Ember Twin’s north pole.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveA Nomai named Coleus was standing on the wandering rock when another Nomai's lantern died. When they relit the lantern, Coleus and the rock were both gone.
TranslationTableEntry.value: qx nOmI nAmd kOlEsx` wxz standiN no` Dx wondRNi` rok wen nx`Dx`qR nOmIz lantRn dId. wen DA rElit Dx lantRn, kOlEsx` na`d Dx rok wR bOT gon.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveTo travel with a quantum object, I must stand on the object and cease to observe my surroundings (meaning I must be in complete darkness). Coleus used this quantum rule to escape the cave he was trapped in.
TranslationTableEntry.value: tU travxl wiT qx kwontxm bo`jekt, qI mst stand no` DE bo`jekt na`d sEs tU bx`zRv mY sRnW`diNz (mEniN qI mxst bE ni` kxmplEt d@knis). kOlEsx` yUzd Dis kwontxm rUl tU si`kAp Dx kAv hE wxz trapt ni`.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveColeus and Merolae returned to examine the rock. They theorized that when a conscious being is in contact with a quantum object and ceases to observe his or her surroundings, the being can become entangled with that quantum object, and they both move together.
TranslationTableEntry.value: kOlEsx` na`d mil*qA ritRnd tU gi`zamin Dx rok. DA TJzI`d Dat wen qx konSxs bENi` zi` ni` kontakt wiT qx kwontxm bo`jekt na`d sEsiz tU bx`zRv hiz q* hR sRnW`diNz, Dx bENi` kan bikxm ni`tANgld wiT Dat kwontxm bo`jekt, na`d DA bOT mUv tugeDR.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai Shuttle
TranslationTableEntry.value: frOzxn nOmI Sxtl

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleI found a Nomai shuttle almost completely encased in ice.
TranslationTableEntry.value: qI fWnd qx nOmI Sxtl lo`mOst kxmplEtlE ni`kAst ni` sI`.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleThe Nomai landed on the Interloper not long after its arrival in the solar system. The shuttle's equipment heard strange energy readings coming from somewhere beneath the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dx nOmI landid no` DE ni`tRlOpR not loN fa`tR ti`s rx`vI`lx` ni` Dx sOlR sistxm. Dx Sxtlz ki`wipmxnt hRd strAnj ne`jR`qE rEdiNz kxmiN frxm sxmw# binET Dx sRfxs.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleThere were three Nomai aboard the shuttle. One of them stayed behind to keep the shuttle warm while the other two explored the Interloper.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreI found the two missing members of the Nomai shuttle crew near a large ruptured stone that looks like it exploded from the inside.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreThe Nomai traced the strange energy readings to a spherical stone casing filled with some form of exotic matter.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreThey determined the exotic matter was both lethal and under extreme pressure. If the stone were to rupture, the exotic matter within would rapidly expand, completely blanketing the solar system almost instantaneously.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean DepthsGabbro says there’s a strong current beneath the surface of the ocean that prevents anything from sinking below it.
